decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Reason (Condition 5)
The details submitted pursuant to condition 5 (travel plan) of permission 00248/D6-7/P1 dated 07.09.07 for 'One nine storey and one twelve storey buildings for business use (Use class B1) associated plant, standby generators and compactors, landscaping, servicing and access arrangements, together with the reconfiguration of the approved car parking layout', are satisfactory (in respect of Building 7).

Please note that the Travel Plan includes ongoing monitoring and review requirements.

Reason (Condition 21)
The details submitted pursuant to condition 21 (waste and recycling) of permission 00248/D6-7/P1 dated 07.09.07 for 'One nine storey and one twelve storey buildings for business use (Use class B1) associated plant, standby generators and compactors, landscaping, servicing and access arrangements, together with the reconfiguration of the approved car parking layout', are satisfactory.

Reason (Condition 22)
The details submitted pursuant to condition 22 (ventilation) of permission 00248/D6-7/P1 dated 07.09.07 for 'One nine storey and one twelve storey buildings for business use (Use class B1) associated plant, standby generators and compactors, landscaping, servicing and access arrangements, together with the reconfiguration of the approved car parking layout', are satisfactory.
description: Details submitted pursuant to conditions 5 (Tavel Plan), 21 (Waste and recycling) and 22 (ventilation) of planning permission reference number 00248/D6-7/P1 dated 07/09/2007 for 'One nine storey and one twelve storey buildings for business use (Use class B1) associated plant, standby generators and compactors, landscaping, servicing and access arrangements, together with the reconfiguration of the approved car parking layout'.
